accessibility.text: Student learning is improved through peer collaboration and by using evidence-based techniques.
Challenges and Opportunities in Physics Education
Women and students of color are significantly underrepresented in physics.
Discipline-Based Education Research (NRC, 2012); \u2028Adapting to a Changing World (NRC, 2013); Reaching Students (NRC, 2015)
Mulvey and Nicholson (AIP, 2012); Adapting to a Changing World (NRC, 2013)
Kozminski et al (AAPT, 2014); Behringer et al (AAPT, 2016); Caballero et al (AAPT, 2020)
Nicholson and Mulvey (AIP, 2011); White and Chu (AIP, 2014)
Physics is changing; new tools, new techniques
Participation in physics has not grown with STEM.
Student learning is improved through peer collaboration and by using evidence-based techniques.
